## HtmlSaveOptions.Encoding property

Specifies the encoding to use when exporting to HTML, MHTML or EPUB. Default value is `new UTF8Encoding(false)` (UTF-8 without BOM).

```csharp
public Encoding Encoding { get; set; }
```
